org.apache.log4j.spi
Class HierarchyEventListenerAdapter

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.apache.log4j.spi.HierarchyEventListenerAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
LoggerEventListener

public final class HierarchyEventListenerAdapter
extends Object
implements LoggerEventListener

Adapter class that wraps an object that implements HierarchyEventListener and exposes the log4j 1.3 introduced LoggerEventListener interface.
